attributes.action: to quit his job and give it to [UKG]TheMajor (lee finnigan) cos you he rocks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like you to quit ur job and give it to me cos i am great, i can really kick bottom in games and think this is what england needs, well that and a nice big new world war :)

labour sucks imho go maj go

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
